profile.title: Start with personal information
profile.description: Include only relevant and professional information. A good personal summary should highlight your strengths and professional goals.

skills.title: Highlight your most relevant skills
skills.description: Prioritize specific skills for the position you're applying for. Include both technical skills and soft skills.

experience.title: Use reverse chronological order
experience.description: Start with your current position, then list previous ones. Highlight concrete and quantifiable achievements in each work experience.

languages.title: Highlight your language skills
languages.description: Specify your proficiency level in each language. Order languages according to their relevance for the position you're applying for.

education.title: Use reverse chronological order
education.description: Start with your most recent education. Include only education relevant to the position and highlight important specializations or mentions.

certificates.title: Use reverse chronological order
certificates.description: Include certifications relevant to the position. Prioritize the most recent ones and those that demonstrate specific skills for the role.

settings.title: Final adjustments to your CV
settings.description: Export your CV or save your settings to continue editing later.
settings.importDescription: Import previously created settings to your profile and continue editing.
settings.exportDescription: Export all settings created to continue editing the CV later.
settings.pdfDescription: Export your CV in PDF format with selectable text and colors.
